channel.title: Self-development on Core-cognition
channel.description: Recent content in Self-development on Core-cognition

item.title: 3 - Identity as coping and co-creation (in)adequacy
item.description: Previously (Andringa, van den Bosch, & Wijermans, 2015) we have connected the existence of an individualâ€™s unique identity to the self-maintenance of the living state. Here we develop the structure of identity in terms of coping and co-creation adequacy. This leads to an enriched understanding of the interplay between coping and co-creation, and it demonstrates that the conceptual language of core cognition is a productive lens for approaching a well-studied psychological phenomenon.
